title: Npc
description: A pathfinder npc from the bestiary

id.description: The id of the npc record.

data.description: The pf2etools json data of the npc.

fluff.description: The fluff data of the npc.

referenceNpcName.description: The name of the npc that serves as the source for this npc's statistics.

sourceFileName.description: The name of the source file that the npc was imported from.

createdAt.description: When the character was first imported

lastUpdatedAt.description: When the character was last updated
